ar: شَهْرُ رَمَضَانَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُنزِلَ فِيهِ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ
en: The month of Ramadan [is that] in which was revealed the Qur'an,
and clear proofs of guidance and criterion.
So whoever sights [the crescent of] the month,

ar: وَمَن كَانَ مَرِيضًا أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ
en: and whoever is ill or on a journey -
then an equal number of other days.
and does not intend for you hardship
and [wants] for you to complete the period
and to glorify Allah for that [to] which He has guided you;
and perhaps you will be grateful.
